external_games.name: Train Simulator: MRCE ES 64 U2 'Taurus' Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: MRCE ES 64 U2 'Taurus' Loco
summary: One of the most modern and most powerful locomotives for cargo and passenger transport in Europe has arrived for Train Simulator 2021. The MRCE ES 64 U2 'Taurus' is a new generation high performance electric locomotive built by Siemens between 2000 and 2008, and part of the second generation of Eurosprinter locomotives built by the company.
